statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_id = 100;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE policy_number IN (1234, 5678);
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, policy_holder_name FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE policy_number IN (1001, 1002, 1003) ORDER BY policy_holder_name DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT policy_number, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT policy_holder_name, claim_date FROM insurance_claims_data WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 6000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM historical_insurance_claims WHERE policy_number='ABC123';
SELECT policy_number, count(*) AS total_claims FROM historical_insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_number;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM historical_insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_number, risk_score FROM risk_forecasting ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM historical_insurance_claims WHERE policy_number = 'P123' AND claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM historical_insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT h.*, rf.risk_score FROM historical_insurance_claims h INNER JOIN risk_forecasting rf ON h.claim_id = rf.claim_id WHERE h.claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_number, COUNT(*) AS num_claims FROM historical_insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_number ORDER BY num_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE is_fraud = TRUE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM PolicyHolders WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskForecasting WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01' AND forecast_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder_id, risk_score FROM RiskForecasting INNER JOIN InsuranceClaims ON RiskForecasting.claim_id = InsuranceClaims.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM PolicyHolders WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';

SELECT InsuranceClaims.claim_id, PolicyHolders.first_name, PolicyHolders.last_name, RiskForecasting.risk_score FROM InsuranceClaims JOIN PolicyHolders ON InsuranceClaims.policy_holder_id = PolicyHolders.policy_holder_id JOIN RiskForecasting ON InsuranceClaims.claim_id = RiskForecasting.claim_id WHERE RiskForecasting.risk_score > 0.8;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date, is_fraud FROM InsuranceClaims WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT PolicyHolders.first_name, PolicyHolders.last_name, RiskForecasting.risk_score FROM PolicyHolders LEFT JOIN RiskForecasting ON PolicyHolders.policy_holder_id = RiskForecasting.policy_holder_id WHERE RiskForecasting.risk_score IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date, premium_amount FROM policyholders;
SELECT risk_description, risk_category FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_level > 2;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_type, claim_description FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date, premium_amount FROM policyholders WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Theft';
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date FROM policyholders ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT risk_description, risk_level FROM risk_factors WHERE risk_category = 'Natural Disaster' AND risk_level > 3;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_history WHERE claim_status IN ('Pending', 'Approved') ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT ch.claim_id, ch.claim_status, ic.policy_number, ic.claim_description FROM claim_history ch INNER JOIN insurance_claims ic ON ch.claim_id = ic.claim_id WHERE ch.claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY ch.claim_id;
SELECT * FROM Insurance_Claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_no, claim_amount FROM Insurance_Claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car';
SELECT company_name, company_rating FROM Insurance_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_age, holder_gender FROM Policy_Holders WHERE holder_age > 30;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, settlement_date, settlement_amount FROM Claims_History WHERE settlement_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, claim_amount FROM Insurance_Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, company_rating, company_location FROM Insurance_Companies WHERE company_rating >= 4 ORDER BY company_rating DESC;
SELECT holder_name, holder_age, holder_gender FROM Policy_Holders WHERE holder_age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY holder_age;
SELECT profile_id, risk_rating, risk_category FROM Risk_Profile WHERE risk_category = 'High' ORDER BY profile_id DESC;
SELECT history_id, claim_id, claim_date, settlement_date, settlement_amount FROM Claims_History WHERE settlement_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
